subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Yankees would like to re-sign the potential free agents Jorge Posada, Mariano Rivera and Alex Rodriguez, and they almost certainly will pick up their $16 million option on right fielder Bobby Abreu.
snippet: The Yankees would like to re-sign the potential free agents Jorge Posada, Mariano Rivera and Alex Rodriguez, and they almost certainly will pick up their $16 million option on right fielder Bobby Abreu.
